research_municipality_step.notes: The elected officials for Taft City, TX, include the Mayor and four Council Members. Elida Castillo was elected Mayor. Esmeralda Cruz-Molina serves as Council Member for Ward 1 and Mayor Pro Tem. Alonzo Molina, Jr. and Moriah Moreno are Council Members for Ward 2. Lucy Lopez is a Council Member for Ward 1. There was a slight discrepancy in the spelling of Moriah Moreno's first name across sources, with 'Mariah' also appearing, but 'Moriah' was more consistently used for the current official.
